attributes.action: The British government to condemn Israel mortar fire killing Palestinians as a Human rights violation
attributes.additional_details:
This conflict had started in the House of Commons and should be condemn in the House of Commons.
Our political class silence on this matter is truly deafening we have seen over 300 Childern die in 18 days which must be a sign that whatever the Israelis objectives our it's not working and the British government who can not get away from its colonial duties must condemn the use of mortars the siege the land grabs and declare this occupation as an act of aggression as a violations of international human rights.
